hypothesis_content.title: Miner Capitulation Contrarian Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: A 7-day rolling average of Bitcoin's Hash Ribbon indicator (30-day SMA of hash rate crossing below 60-day SMA) signaling 'capitulation' will be followed by a mean-reverting BTC price rally of at least +15% within the next 21 trading days, when initiated during a NEUTRAL or BEAR regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Historical miner capitulation phases have often marked local price bottoms, as weak hands are flushed out and selling pressure from distressed miners subsides. The recent VanEck research highlights this as a contrarian signal. The oversold RSI filter helps avoid catching a 'falling knife' during strong downtrends.
entry_conditions: BTC Hash Ribbon 7DMA signals 'capitulation' (30-day hash rate SMA < 60-day SMA)

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC price increases +15% from entry close
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price declines -8% from entry close

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 21-day forward return after capitulation signal in NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes is ≤ +5% or has a win rate < 55% over a 5-year backtest.
